text1:
User-guided segmentation

Step 1: Draw a bounding box around the ROI.
Step 2: Draw the ROI's outline and fill it in.
Step 3: The segmented image will be saved to the same directory as the input image.
Step 4: The saved image will be generated as a text file and saved in the same directory as the input image.
Step 5:Clear the selection and go back to Step 1.
text4:
PCA plot of source domain embeddings

Step 1: Choose a set of directories containing embeddings to be plotted.

Step 2: A PCA plot of embeddings will be created.


New domain

Step 1: Select a set of directories containing embeddings to be plotted and then select a file generated by a new image.

Step 2: A new PCA plot will be created and the distances of the new points to each set of data in the embedding directory will be generated.
